title: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel Intelligent Self-Balancing Electric Motorized Scooters
text: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel Intelligent Self-Balancing Electric Motorized Scooters At the mention of fashion, it’s hard to hold a universal view of it, because everyone has his or her own standard. Airwheel, however, leading the fashion of transportation by its state-of-the-art technology and fashionable appearance, fulfill customers’ needs with various models. USA, 16 September 2015 -- When it comes to the transports, bus, subway, private car, or even bike will come into people’s mind. However, we have already felt tired of the crowed public transportation and the traffic congestion every early morning. Cycling may partly solves the problem, but there is no novelty. People are seeking a new way of transportation for a good time, which will be both intelligent and fashionable. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter , featured by the low-carbon emission, is the newest and environmentally friendly vehicle. A technology product leads the fashion trend as well. Airwheel, representing the modern technology, beautiful design and powerful engine, takes the lead role in both technology and fashion. As a modern technology product, Airwheel investigates customers’ need and provides them with intelligent scooters with diverse shape and functions. The classic unicycle X series are designed to people who love adventure, because of its powerful engine and strong battery. The Airwheel-made dual-wheel Q series has an exquisite look and is easy to learn, especially designed for women. Airwheel A3, with the sitting-posture mode, is a perfect transport for city commuter who lives far away from their companies. Airwheel S5, another new product of 2015, is designed for cross-country lovers, which has no problem of going up and down stairs.All the Airwheel electric scooters are outfitted with the most advanced intelligent chip in the world. The chip adopts the state-of-the-art intelligent system with theory of flight control, Fuzzy Algorithm and gyroscope to stay balanced. A simple turn of users’ body could help them to handle the scooter. This chip, including its technology and algorithm, is the cornerstone of Airwheel and lead Airwheel to move further. As the company is making breakthrough again and again, one day, hopefully, Airwheel would create an astonishing platform for users to show their intelligence of the vehicle and their understanding of fashion. With the intelligence and fashion, Airwheel intelligent scooter attracts people attention and is entering the mainstream market. The bright future of the scooter industry is coming. # # #
